title: American Journal of Psychotherapy

renewed-contributions.title: Theory and Practice of Personality Integration
renewed-contributions.note: Issue date for this article is as given in the renewal record.  Some citation indexes put this article in the October 1948 issue instead.  We have not yet consulted a copy of the 1948 volume to determine the article's actual issue date.

additional-note: Only two copyright renewals in CCE or the registered works database mention this journal.  One is the renewal for the the 1948 Perls article.  The other is a 1987 renewal for the 1959 book 'Counseling and Psychotherapy: Theory and Practice' by Cecil Helden Patterson.  That renewal mentions that part of the book was previously published in the American Journal of Psychotherapy.  We do not know the date of that prior publication, or it it would be covered by the book's renewal. (A pre-1959 publication presumably would not be.)
